nodes.text: Ketzali was a planet located in the Mid Rim region. The historian Eloc Throno included a map with the location of Ketzali in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a book authored by Throno that detailed the planet Batuu. The planet shared its name with the Ketzalian species.
Ketzali was mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
